.
Danger of Paraphrasing
Paraphrasing in easy-to-understand language requires care because the paraphrase might
misstate the law, or
misstate or mistake medical facts.
Example
:  Use paraphrased language to help explain why the claim has been denied, but do not expressly state,
The law says that…
Simply insert the paraphrase.
